description: A CSS file defining styles, variables, and media queries for a responsive web application, specifically managing light and dark themes.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Styles for the main application layout including text alignment, background color, and general appearance.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo with height and animation settings.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the application header, including layout and color transitions.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application, including color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button with layout, colors, and hover effects.
